Information..........: 2 CDs; one comprised of "new" (Faith in the Heartland was previously recorded with Steve Augeri on the 2005 album, Generations) tracks, and the other CD comprised of re-recorded "greatest hits" (all of the tracks were on the 1988 Greatest Hits album except for the track "Stone in Love"). It also includes a DVD featuring a live concert in Las Vegas, Nevada, on March 8, 2008. It is the first release by Journey to feature their newest and current (as of June 13th, 2008) lead vocalist, Arnel Pineda (of the cover band the Zoo).

Ripped by............: 4RM0 on 2008/06/08
Included.............: Both CDs ripped to .mp3 @320kbps, DVD ripped to .avi (XviD video with a resolution of 720x480 at 29 fps [NTSC] with a data rate of 178kbps and AC3 6-channel audio at a bit rate of 256kbps), the complete text of the booklet included with the CD (including thanks from the band as well as individual members, and song/album credits), lyrics for each track on the album, .m3u playlist (for both CDs and the DVD-Rip), a .nfo file (you're reading it), DVD (.jpg) and the album's front and back covers.
